query.statement: SELECT A.UPJANG , A.OCCUR_PRICE , A.REMARK , A.CONTENTS , A.ACCTCD , B.ACCTNM , A.SALE_TYPE , C.CODE_NAME AS SALE_TYPE_NAME , A.SUBINV_CODE --, D.SUBINV_NAME_DISP , A.MEAL AS MEAL_CODE --, G.CODE_NAME AS MEAL , A.CUST_ID , E.CUSTNM , NVL(A.TAX_CODE, D.TAX_CODE) AS TAX_CODE --, A.TAX_CODE --, DECODE(A.TAX_CODE,'100','과세','210','면세','220','영세') AS TAX_NM , DECODE(NVL(A.TAX_CODE, D.TAX_CODE),'100','과세','210','면세','220','영세') AS TAX_NM , A.OCCUR_QTY , A.OCCUR_AMT , A.OCCUR_ID , A.OCCUR_DATE , DECODE(A.USE_YN,'Y',1,0) AS USE_YN --FROM FMO_ACCT_OCCUR A, FMO_ACCOUNT B, SCC_COMMON_CODE C, /*FMS_SUBINVENTORY D,*/ FMS_CUSTOM E, FMS_UPJANG F FROM FMO_ACCT_OCCUR A, FMO_ACCOUNT B, SCC_COMMON_CODE C, FMS_SUBINVENTORY D, FMS_CUSTOM E, FMS_UPJANG F /*,(SELECT Z.CODE, Z.CODE_NAME, Z.SORT_SEQ FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE Z WHERE Z.GROUP_CODE = 'FS0023') G*/ WHERE (1=1) AND A.UPJANG = F.UPJANG AND F.MAIN_UPJANG= B.UPJANG AND A.ACCTCD = B.ACCTCD AND A.SALE_TYPE = C.CODE --AND A.UPJANG = D.UPJANG --AND A.SUBINV_CODE = D.SUBINV_CODE AND A.SUBINV_CODE = D.SUBINV_CODE AND A.CUST_ID = E.CUST_ID --AND A.MEAL = G.CODE AND A.UPJANG = #UPJANG# AND A.OCCUR_DATE = #OCCUR_DATE# AND B.ACCT_TYPE = '001' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.GROUP_CODE = '매출유형' ORDER BY /*G.SORT_SEQ,*/ A.UDATE DESC
